summary: Adds map markers to all player homes
descriptionHtml:
Traduction française disponible sur La Confrérie des Traducteurs:
[url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/jouabilite/marqueurs_de_carte_pour_les_maisons_du_joueur.php]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/jouabilite/marqueurs_de_carte_pour_les_maisons_du_joueur.php[/url]

Deutsche Übersetzung von norden:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6481]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6481[/url]

Japanese localizaton patch by aohige:
[url=http://www.4shared.com/archive/gK3dsvZe/Player_Home_Map_Markers_v05_.html]http://www.4shared.com/archive/gK3dsvZe/Player_Home_Map_Markers_v05_.html[/url]


[size=3][color=lightgreen]Player Home Map Markers v0.5 (by Volek)[/color][/size]

Adds map markers to the following locations:

* Whiterun, Breezehome (front door)
* Windhelm, Hjerim (front door)
* Markarth, Vlindrel Hall (front door)
* College Of Winterhold, Arch-Mage\'s Quarters (roof)
* Solitude, Proudspire Manor (front door)
* Riften, Honeyside (front door and balcony on the outside)


Installation:
Extract the contents of the zip file to your Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/ folder, overwrite files if asked.

If you want colored home markers, check out dw420\'s mod here:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4646]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4646[/url]

Version History:
0.5 - changed Archmage Quarters icon, added Honeyside Balcony marker
0.4 - changed marker icons of most homes (thanks to dw420!)
0.3 - added marker to Honeyside front door (thanks to shittakaburi!)
0.2 - added marker to Proudspire Manor front door.
0.1 - initial release
author: Volek
